headline: How the Narrative Around Deckers Outdoor Is Shifting as Growth Expectations Cool
summary: Deckers Outdoor’s latest narrative shift leaves its fair value estimate steady at about $112 per share, even as a slightly higher discount rate and essentially unchanged revenue growth outlook highlight a more cautious stance around execution risk. This subtle recalibration reflects a tug of war between confidence in Hoka and Ugg’s multiyear brand strength, and mounting concerns about slowing growth and tougher comparisons ahead. Stay tuned to see how investors can track these evolving...
